728965f-a.title: Richmond: Howard Avenue - Arlo Road
728965f-a.text:
Howard Avenue, west side, slightly east of Arlo Road, showing
a water tower of the Department of Water Supply, City of New York.
The tower is 150 feet back of the avenue.
June 23, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
728965f-a.folder: Howard Avenue & Arlo Road, Staten Island, NY
